key_with_description: Check it out! This key has a brand new description! (At least in some formats)
nested.deeply.key: Wow, this key is really nested even deeper.
nested.key: This newest key is nested inside a new namespace.
simple_key: Just an ordinary but still a brand new key with a simple message.
unverified_key: This translation is not yet completely verified and waits for it. (In some formats we also export this status)
